name: Drew Kitch
body:
### Projects
* [VIES outage tracker](https://github.com/whiteotter/vies-outage-tracker)
* [Kinescope](https://github.com/whiteotter/kinescope)
* [ScriptLogger](https://github.com/whiteotter/script_logger)
* [Druuid.gen_range](https://github.com/recurly/druuid/pull/9)
* [FI Calculator](https://codepen.io/whiteotter/pen/ONgwJB)

***
### Experiences
#### _Support Engineer_ at **Recurly** in Boulder, CO (February 2014 - Current)
>Investigated reported bugs and worked to provide their resolution. Scripted sql queries to fix data, fulfill custom report requests on behalf of VIP clients and investigate the scope as well as pattern of reported issues. Performed credit card data imports. Consulted on integration best practices with merchants. Named Q3 Recurly “Champion” in 2015. Promoted to team lead in 2016.

#### _Developer Intern_ at **Bountysource** in San Francisco, CA (September 2013 - February 2014)
>Full stack development projects with AngularJS and Ruby on Rails (rabl-rails).

#### _HTML/CSS Scaffolder_ at **AlumniFunder** in Santa Monica, CA (Spring 2013 - Summer 2013)
> HTML/JS/CSS employed in node/mysql environment.

#### _Student_ at **Dev Bootcamp** in San Francisco, CA (Fall 2012)
> Ruby/Rails coursework

#### _Contingent Worker_ at **Facebook** in Menlo Park, CA (Summer 2012)
> Assisted Business Operations Program Manager in the reporting of financial data.  Tested analytical tools for quality assurance.

Complete resume can be found [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1np_uNCrYbHtEIT_qqZOU-7MNrD3UKypkBftuIDXPIlg/edit?pref=2&pli=1)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
